landing.hero: Fast pickup & coordination around the clock.
landing.subheadline: We deliver OTC products. We reserve prescription medicines at your nearest pharmacy for pickup.
landing.availabilityBadge: Many pharmacies open right now in Vienna
landing.reassurance4: Cash or invoice – pay on pickup/delivery
landing.microReassurance: No commitment • Cancel anytime • BASG-checked partners
landing.testimonial1: OTC pain relief delivered on Sunday – no hassle.
landing.testimonial2: Prescription reserved at pharmacy, picked up in an hour.
landing.testimonialSenior: Thanks to the big buttons and voice input it was so easy.
landing.footer: MediFast – Vienna. Medicine when you need it.

legal.disclaimer: Notice: Prescription medicines cannot be shipped online in Austria. We only coordinate reservation/pickup at a pharmacy. Only non-prescription products can be delivered.
legal.partnerDisclaimer: We work with registered Austrian pharmacies (BASG-checked).

consent.title: Welcome to MediFast
consent.ageMessage: To use MediFast, please confirm that you are at least 18 years old.
consent.gdprMessage: We process your data in accordance with GDPR. Health data is only used for coordination with pharmacies and not shared with third parties. By clicking "Accept" you consent.
consent.declineMessage: You must consent to use this site.

senior.modeOn: Large text, high contrast, voice input
